Roll No. : SECOB221

Project Title :Property Rate calculator.

Objective : To predict price of property.

Problem statement : Making a website to predict price of property by taking input of size and locality from user.

Solution : In this we will make a website with having a database on backed containing rates per sq.ft. of different locations . These features will be used to predict the price of the property.

Project Title :Flower detection

Objective : To make an app for detecting types of flower.

Problem statement : To make an app for detecting types of flower by taking input from user.

Solution : We will an input in form of image from user and base on colour and shape we will display whether it is a flower or not if it is flower we will display its information .
